wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Fredrick Shaw (born 1 August 1869) was an English footballer who played in The Football League for Loughborough, Notts County and Nottingham Forest.

response: Arthur Shaw is the name of:
* Arthur Shaw (footballer, born 1924) (1924–2015), English professional footballer
* Arthur Shaw (trade unionist) (1880–1939), British trade union leader
